Element.name: AttributesRestrictionCondition
Element.Description: A condition based on an attribute value. The Value property is mandatory if the chosen predicate requires an input value to compute the boolean result.

PropertyCategory.name: General
PropertyCategory.Property: The set of attributes available as output parameters.
The predicate used in the condition.
If checked, the predicate evaluation is performed ignoring case sensitivity.
The boolean operator used to concatenate conditions produced by applying the condition on multiple values.
Indicates if the condition is required or implied.
